scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, likely the Flight into Egypt. Saint Joseph, an elderly man with a white beard and a turban-like hat, leads a donkey. The Virgin Mary, wearing a blue mantle over a brown tunic, is seated on the donkey, holding the Christ Child. The Christ Child, with a halo, is reaching out his hand. They are traveling through a landscape with rolling hills, trees, and scattered bushes. In the background, distant buildings with spires and windmills are visible. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with foliate motifs.
